name: StarWarsCountdown(Unofficial)
0:
”Alexa, ask Countdown for Episode IX.”
”Alexa, ask Countdown, how long until Episode IX?”
”Alexa, ask Countdown, when will Episode IX be released?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: count down
des:
This IS the skill you're looking for!
Is the default movie countdown not good enough for you? Who wants a countdown in years and months anyway? Star Wars Countdown can tell you the exact number of days until all of the new Star Wars movies!

This skill is very simple, you can ask Alexa:

To tell you when a movie comes out
How long is left until a movie is released
Or just ask for the name of the movie you want

"The Force is strong with this one" :)
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
